settings.collapsible_tab_text:
• We provide stones for you to use during the class. You are welcome to purchase stones the day of the class or bring your own if you have them.
  • Class price includes a $50 credit against sharpening gear purchased during the class.
  • Class size is limited to 4 people and will last 2 hours.
  • All participants receive 10% off knives and waterstones purchased on the day.

• Kitchen knives to sharpen. Chef’s knives are the easiest, flexible is the hardest. No Serrated knives.
  • You're own waterstones if you have them

settings.text: Classes run from January to the end of November. For children under 16, please contact us before booking.  For private classes click here.
